text: Somerville High School is a public high school located in Somerville, Texas (USA). It is the sole high school in the Somerville Independent School District and is classified as a 2A school by the UIL. In 2016, the school was rated "Improvement Required" by the Texas Education Agency. ==Athletics== The Somerville Yeguas compete in the following sports:The Athletics Department *Baseball *Basketball *Cross Country *Football *Golf *Softball *Tennis *Track and Field *Volleyball ==References== ==External links== * Official Website Category:Schools in Burleson County, Texas Category:Public high schools in Texas
title: Somerville High School (Texas)
